data.title: Writer and activist Sadia Dehlvi passes away
data.meta_description: Noted Delhi-based writer and activist Sadia Dehlvi has passed away after a prolonged battle with cancer.      She was 63.     	    Sadia was admitted to a New Delhi hospital recently where she was undergoing treatment.      She

Doc's murder: CBI grills RG Kar ex-principal; looks into call details

Ghosh was asked to specify his role after getting the news of the death of the doctor, who he had contacted and why he made the parents wait for nearly three hours, he said.
